first_para: Michael Roy Wood (born 3 March 1946) is a British Labour politician, who was Member of Parliament for Batley and Spen from 1997 to 2015. He is a member of the left-wing Socialist Campaign Group, and is considered one of the more independently minded Labour MPs.

full.extract: Michael Roy Wood (born 3 March 1946) is a British Labour politician, who was Member of Parliament for Batley and Spen from 1997 to 2015. He is a member of the left-wing Socialist Campaign Group, and is considered one of the more independently minded Labour MPs.
full.title: Mike Wood (politician)
